title: UI Developer - Angular
jobDescription:
Edrevel, a cloud based AI powered Learning Experience Platform is seeking a skilled and experienced UI Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in modern UI development and be proficient in framework such as Angular using Typescript. Experience with React is considered an added advantage. As a UI Developer for Edrevel, you will work on developing and maintaining cutting-edge mobile and web applications enhancing the Edrevel product suite.


Roles & Responsibilities:

* Develop highly interactive and user-friendly web applications using Angular, Ionic, Cordova, and Capacitor frameworks.

* Unit testing of all code and ensuring delivery of zero defect code

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams for seamless integration of frontend components with backend services.

* Create reusable, clean, and well-documented code with HTML, CSS, and other frontend technologies.

* Utilize RESTful JSON APIs for efficient data communication between frontend and backend.

* Participate in code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting of frontend systems.

* Maintain software documentation using tools such as Confluence and JIRA.

* Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.


Requirements:

* Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

* Passion for developing flawless user experience.

* 3 - 5 years of professional experience as a Frontend Engineer, preferably with Angular, Ionic, Cordova, and Capacitor.

* Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and client-side Typescript.

* Proven expertise in building scalable, high-performance frontend applications for B2C or B2B software products.

* Solid architectural skills with a focus on performance, scalability, and security.

* Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.


Preferred Qualifications:

* Experience with React is a plus.

* Understanding of Agile methodologies and project management tools.

* Familiarity with state management libraries like NgRx.

* Knowledge of automated testing frameworks and tools.


Company Benefits

* Competitive Salary: Attractive compensation packages.

* Provident Fund: Contribution to retirement savings.

* Health Insurance: Comprehensive medical coverage for employees and their families.

* KT sessions: Regular workshops, seminars, and training sessions on trending technologies.

* Collaborative Culture: Team-building activities and a supportive environment.

* On-site Amenities: Cafeterias, recreational areas, and relaxation zones.

ambitionBoxData.Title: Rudra Innovative Software Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for a React Native / Mobile App developer interested in building mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. Candidate is responsible for architecting and building applications, as well as coordinating with the teams. If you love solving problems, believe in collaboration, and are committed to quality product/project development this role is perfect for you.

Experience

1+ to 4 years

Responsibilities
  • Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms
  • Perform well in a fast-paced environment and contribute to optimal flow in a rapidly changing design/technology environment
  • Identify, diagnose, and fix bugs/issues for optimum performance.
  • Maintain code and write code using Redux to store data and to ensure that the product is of the highest quality.
  • Working on native APIs for integrations with both platforms.
  • Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
  • Coordinate with co-developers and keeps project manager well informed of the status of development effort and serves as a liaison between development staff and project manager
  • Building apps and making them published for both stores.
Requirements
  • Minimum 3+ years of experience.
  • Strong knowledge of App UI design principles, patterns, and best practices and Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications.
  • Excellent skill in React and React Native
  • Good command on Javascript coding and ES6 standards.
  • Good knowledge of using RESTful and/or GraphQL
  • Must be familiar with state management tools like Redux or redux-saga
  • Good to have familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages
  • Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Android Studio & Visual Studio.
  • Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
Qualification
  • MCA, B.Tech / B.Sc /M.Sc in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject

title: Android Developer - Kotlin
tagsAndSkills: Android Development,RESTful API,Android ecosystem,Google Android,mobile development,Android SDK,Kotlin,Android Application Development
jobDescription:
About the Role :

We are seeking a talented and passionate Android Developer to join our team and play a key role in creating innovative and user-friendly mobile applications.

You will be responsible for the entire development lifecycle, from design and implementation to testing and deployment.

Responsibilities :

- Design, develop, and maintain high-quality, performant, and scalable Android applications using Kotlin.

- Collaborate with designers and product managers to translate user stories and wireframes into functional and intuitive user interfaces (UI) that adhere to natural user interaction (NUI) principles.

- Integrate Android applications with back-end services using RESTful APIs.

- Ensure applications are compatible across various Android versions and screen sizes.

- Implement offline storage mechanisms and optimize application performance through threading and code optimization techniques.

- Leverage the open-source Android ecosystem and utilize libraries for common tasks.

- Design and develop applications that adhere to Google's Android design principles and interface guidelines.

- Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code.

- Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving code quality.

- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the Android development landscape.

Qualifications :

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.

- 3-5 years of professional experience in Android development.

- Proficient in Kotlin, Android SDK, various Android versions, and responsive design techniques.

- Experience with RESTful APIs and integrating them with Android applications.

- Understanding of offline storage, threading, and performance tuning best practices.

- Ability to design intuitive user interfaces with a focus on natural user interaction (NUI).

- Familiarity with using additional sensors like gyroscopes and accelerometers in Android applications.

- Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and commonly used libraries.

- Solid understanding of Google's Material Design principles and Android interface guidelines.

- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

- Strong communication, collaboration, and teamwork abilities.

- Passion for mobile development and a desire to learn and adapt to new technologies.

Location: Delhi NCR,Bangalore,Chennai,Pune,Kolkata,Ahmedabad,Mumbai,Hyderabad

ambitionBoxData.Title: Forward Eye Technologies Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are seeking a passionate and highly skilled iOS Developer to join our growing mobile development team.

You will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining innovative iOS applications that leverage the power of the Internet of Things (IoT) and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology.

By combining your expertise in iOS development with your understanding of IoT and BLE, you will help us create next-generation mobile experiences that seamlessly interact with connected devices.

Responsibilities :

- Design, develop, and implement user-friendly and intuitive features for iOS applications using Swift and the latest Apple SDKs.

- Leverage BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) technology to enable communication between iOS devices and various IoT devices.

- Develop robust and secure communication protocols for reliable data exchange with IoT devices.

- Design user interfaces (UI) that are aesthetically pleasing, user-friendly, and adhere to Human Interface Guidelines (HIG).

- Implement unit testing and user interface (UI) testing to ensure code quality and application stability.

- Troubleshoot and debug complex application issues related to both iOS development and BLE communication.

- Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to translate ideas into high-quality mobile applications that integrate seamlessly with IoT devices.

- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in iOS development tools, frameworks, and IoT technologies relevant to your projects.

- Participate in code reviews and contribute to maintaining high code quality within the team.

- Assist with DevOps tasks for continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) of applications (a plus).

Technical Skills (Required) :

Educational Qualifications : Bachelor's/Master's

- 5-7 years of experience in developing iOS applications with strong proficiency in Swift and the latest Apple SDKs (UIKit, SwiftUI).

- In-depth understanding of iOS architecture and design patterns (MVC, MVVM).

- Solid experience with BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) development frameworks and protocols.

- Experience with security best practices for mobile application development.

- Experience with unit testing frameworks (eg, XCTest) and UI testing tools (e.g, XCUITest).

- Proficiency with version control systems (e.g, Git) and CI/CD practices.

- Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and critical thinking skills.

- Strong communication, collaboration, and teamwork skills.

- Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects effectively, and meet deadlines.
